summary: Feature request to add serialization context support for codecs and converters in the Ruby SDK, aligned with cross-SDK effort to standardize this capability including Nexus support.
userImpact: Users will be able to pass context information to custom codecs and converters, enabling more sophisticated serialization strategies.
proposedFix: Implement serialization context support as specified in the cross-SDK features issue #434, including Nexus support per issue #678.
keyQuote: Make sure to include nexus per https://github.com/temporalio/features/issues/678
